00245 template<class TYPE> inline
00246 Vector2D<TYPE>::Vector2D() {
00247 }
00248 
00249 template<class TYPE>
00250 Vector2D<TYPE>::Vector2D(const Vector2D<TYPE>& rhs) {
00251     // Do NOT make inner Vector<> part of swallow copy!
00252     // Fetcch datum before copy.
00253     for (size_t i = 0; i < rhs.mData.size(); i++)
00254         this->appendVector(i, rhs.mData[i]);
00255 }
00256 
00257 template<class TYPE>
00258 Vector2D<TYPE>::~Vector2D() {
00259 }
00260 
00261 template<class TYPE>
00262 const Vector2D<TYPE>&
00263 Vector2D<TYPE>::operator= (const Vector2D<TYPE>& rhs) {
00264     clear();
00265 
00266     for (size_t i = 0; i < rhs.mData.size(); i++)
00267         appendVector(i, rhs.mData[i]);
00268 
00269     return *this;
00270 }

00272 template<class TYPE>
00273 const Vector<TYPE>& Vector2D<TYPE>::operator[] (size_t index) const {
00274     return mData[index];
00275 }

00277 template<class TYPE>
00278 void Vector2D<TYPE>::clear() {
00279     for (size_t i = 0; i < mData.size(); i++) {
00280         Vector<TYPE> vec = mData[i];
00281         vec.clear();
00282     }
00283     mData.clear();
00284 }
00285 
00286 template<class TYPE>
00287 size_t Vector2D<TYPE>::size() const {
00288     if (mData.size() == 0) {
00289         return 0;
00290     } else {
00291         size_t N = 0;
00292         for (size_t i = 0; i < mData.size(); i++)
00293             N += mData[i].size();
00294         return N;
00295     }
00296 }
00297 
00298 template<class TYPE>
00299 bool Vector2D<TYPE>::isEmpty() const {
00300     if (mData.isEmpty())
00301         return true;
00302 
00303     if (size() == 0)
00304         return true;
00305     else
00306         return false;
00307 }
00308 
00309 template<class TYPE>
00310 size_t Vector2D<TYPE>::capacity() const {
00311     size_t N = 0;
00312     for (size_t i = 0; i < mData.size(); i++)
00313         N += mData[i].capacity();
00314     return N;
00315 }
00316 
00317 template<class TYPE>
00318 size_t Vector2D<TYPE>::idvCapacity(size_t index) const {
00319     int32_t N = (index + 1) - mData.size();
00320     if (N > 0) {
00321         // Query index is out-of-range. Should assert?
00322         // Since it hurts nobody, we keep quiet here.
00323         return 0;
00324     }
00325     return mData[index].capacity();
00326 }
00327 
00328 template<class TYPE>
00329 void Vector2D<TYPE>::setIdvCapacity(size_t index, size_t size) {
00330     int32_t N = (index + 1) - mData.size();
00331     if (N > 0) {
00332         Vector<TYPE> vec;
00333         while (N > 0) {
00334             mData.append(vec);
00335             --N;
00336         }
00337     }
00338     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index];
00339     innerVec.setCapacity(size);
00340 }
00341 
00342 template<class TYPE>
00343 const TYPE& Vector2D<TYPE>::itemAt(size_t index1, size_t index2) const {
00344     return (mData[index1])[index2];
00345 }

00347 template<class TYPE>
00348 void Vector2D<TYPE>::append(size_t index, const TYPE& item, size_t numItems) {
00349     int32_t N = (index + 1) - mData.size();
00350     if (N > 0) {
00351         Vector<TYPE> vec;
00352         while (N > 0) {
00353             mData.append(vec);
00354             --N;
00355         }
00356     }
00357     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index];
00358     innerVec.append(item, numItems);
00359 }

00361 template<class TYPE>
00362 void Vector2D<TYPE>::appendVector(size_t index, const Vector<TYPE>& vector) {
00363     int32_t N = (index + 1) - mData.size();
00364     if (N > 0) {
00365         Vector<TYPE> vec;
00366         while (N > 0) {
00367             mData.append(vec);
00368             --N;
00369         }
00370     }
00371     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index];
00372     innerVec.appendVector(vector);

00375 template<class TYPE>
00376 void Vector2D<TYPE>::insertAt(size_t index1, size_t index2,
00377     const TYPE& prototype_item, size_t numItems) {
00378     int32_t N = (index1 + 1) - mData.size();
00379     if (N > 0) {
00380         Vector<TYPE> vec;
00381         while (N > 0) {
00382             mData.append(vec);
00383             --N;
00384         }
00385     }
00386     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index1];

00390 template<class TYPE>
00391 void Vector2D<TYPE>::insertVectorAt(size_t index1, size_t index2,
00392     const Vector<TYPE>& vector) {
00393     int32_t N = (index1 + 1) - mData.size();
00394     if (N > 0) {
00395         Vector<TYPE> vec;
00396         while (N > 0) {
00397             mData.append(vec);
00398             --N;
00399         }
00400     }
00401     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index1];
00402     innerVec.insertVectorAt(vector, index2);

00405 template<class TYPE>
00406 void Vector2D<TYPE>::removeAt(size_t index1, size_t index2, size_t count) {
00407     int32_t N = (index1 + 1) - mData.size();
00408     if (N > 0) return;
00409     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index1];
00410     innerVec.removeAt(index2, count);
00411 }
00412 
00413 template<class TYPE>
00414 void Vector2D<TYPE>::replaceAt(size_t index1, size_t index2, const TYPE& item) {
00415     int32_t N = (index1 + 1) - mData.size();
00416     if (N > 0) return;
00417     Vector<TYPE> innerVec = mData[index1];
00418     innerVec.replaceAt(item, index2);
00419 }
00420 
00421 template<class TYPE>
00422 Array<TYPE> Vector2D<TYPE>::toArray(size_t index) const {
00423     int32_t N = (index + 1) - mData.size();
00424     if (N > 0) return Array<TYPE>(0);
00425     return mData[index].toArray();
00426 }
